item.title: Hello
item.description: 一 二 三 #include <iostream>using namespace std; int main() { return 0; } $$ a^2 = c^2 + d^2 $$ 重点 斜线 hello 引 When $a \ne 0$, there are two solutions to $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$ and they are: $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}$$ When $a \ne 0$, there are two solutions to \(ax^2 + bx + c = 0\) and they are:
